text: Multiracial identity denial in the United States is also named . Multiracial identity denial in the United States does things to the lives of many people in the United States of America.http://doi.org/10.1037/cdp0000170http://doi.org/10.1016/j.ijintrel.2018.12.005 Multiracial identity denial in the United States is a common wrong thought about people in that country. It is a way of thinking among some people which makes them think that people in the United States of America who have more than one race are really of only one race.http://doi.org/10.1017/9781009202695 ==Making the idea== Cheryan and Monin (2005) coined this term. That means: Cheryan and Monin (2005) made the string of words that give us the title of this article.http://doi.org/10.1111/j.1540-4560.2008.01594.x Many people have said good things about this paper, like Rockquemore et al., 2009, Kang and Bodenhausen 2015, Causadias 2013 and many others. ==What this does== Multiracial identity denial in the United States worsens the way science about identifying multiraciality is done.http://doi.org/10.1111/spc3.12642 Multiracial identity denial in the United States makes some people who do science think a wrong thing about a kind of people. That wrong thing is that they can only be African American or of 2 races. That kind of people is people with a parent who is of European race and a parent who is of African race.http://doi.org/10.1111/j.1533-8525.2002.tb00052.x Many experts have said good things about this paper, like Shih and Sanchez 2005, Gaither 2015, Verkuyten 2018 and many others. Multiracial identity denial in the United States worsens the way science about helping the minds of multiracial people is done.https://psycnet.apa.org/buy/2008-09087-010 Franco and O'Brien 2018 find 3 kinds of multiracial identity denial in the minds of people in the United States of America: Behavior Invalidation, Phenotype Invalidation, and Identity Incongruent Discrimination.http://doi.org/10.1037/cdp0000170 Many experts have said good things about Franco and O'Brien 2018, like Atkin and Yoo 2019, Ma et al., 2021, Oh et al., 2023 and many others. http://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=8767620999720496861&as;_sdt=20000005&sciodt;=0,21&hl;=en are a part of multiracial identity denial in the United States of America.http://doi.org/10.7916/k9mt-ec97 Johnson and Alexander 2024 say good things about von Numers 2023. ==Other things that are like this== People who do science may make 2 mistakes. The 1st mistake is thinking something without good reason. The 2nd mistake is saying something without good reason. That something is that a person is of more than 1 race if they are not really of more than 1 race. These mistakes are parts of .https://psycnet.apa.org/doiLanding?doi=10.1037/amp0000975 People thinking that Native Americans are not Native Americans even though they say they are is . Campbell and Troyer 2007 find that people often deny Native American identity.http://doi.org/10.1177/000312240707200505 About 261 experts have said good things about Campbell and Troyer 2007 paper. Some of those experts are Burton et al., 2010, Wray et al., 2011, Roth 2016 and many others. http://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=17417234390454044102&as;_sdt=20000005&sciodt;=0,21&hl;=en is a wrong thought. American identity denial sometimes happens when a person says that they are American. That person is: an immigrant; or a child of an immigrant. That wrong thought is that that person cannot be American. That wrong thought causes mental health problems in that person.http://doi.org/10.1177/0146167218788553 Ma et al., 2021, Garay and Remedios 2021, Atkin et al., 2022 and Hays-Thomas 2016 and many others say good things about this paper. ==References== Category:Ethnicity
